entries.s_f5d9b5d4: Supply convoys mostly. When they can get through the Sith Shadow attacks that is. The margin between what we have and what we need always stays slim, however.
entries.s_efa47d4e: Your confidence is impressive. I hope it's not empty bravado. Speak to Captain Sarguillo right over there. He'll give you all the blood and guts you can stand.
entries.s_e1b39e83: Well you don't need a shield for that. You just need me!
entries.s_cf4025df: I'd be willing to sweep the area for their spies and outposts.
entries.s_cc50daed: We're building a Mark 4 shield generator to defend our village. They are used in that.
entries.s_bdd3bae5: Here you are.  Remember you may use the crystal to view your progress.
entries.s_b77f095d: Watch out! Someone dropped a box of phase relay filaments around here. They can get into your electronics and short them out.
entries.s_afcc98d2: A shield generator for an agro-colony? You must grow really juicy Maroj Melons.
entries.s_ac2de13b: Mostly resources for the shield. Speak to Eozlin to the northwest of here. He should be able to tell you the specifics.
entries.s_abd57d77: That would be most helpful. Speak to Dageerin to the west over by the communal huts.
entries.s_9dc8bf5d: I seem to have misplaced my Force crystal.  May I have another?
entries.s_893aaeea: Usually I'd laugh at that, friend. No, we actually do have need of it. We were recently assaulted by a gang calling itself the Sith Shadows. They killed many of our people and destroyed our crops and much of the village.
entries.s_78eeb91e: Phase relay filaments? They are only used for repairing starship shields.
entries.s_6aefa2ce: Well, I could see about finding resources. What do you need?
entries.s_6acff81: I like your enthusiasm. Speak to Quharek near the shield generator construction site. I am sure he will appreciate the help.
entries.s_6857cea2: You're kidding. I've got to get in on this! where do I sign up?
entries.s_5d8d739e: How are you getting the resources for such a massive project?
entries.s_4d973713: That's what we're doing. Well, building one from scratch really. We've got the beginnings of a Mark 4 shield generator right over there.
entries.s_199fe2af: I sense you already have a crystal and do not need another.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (village_elder_3.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
